name: Air Apprentice
description: You're getting good at that air thing. You've made 10 air matches!

name: Fire Apprentice
description: You're getting good at that fire thing. You've made 10 fire matches!

name: Water Apprentice
description: You're getting good at that water thing. You've made 10 water matches!

name: Earth Apprentice
description: You're getting good at that earth thing. You've made 10 earth matches!

name: Void Apprentice
description: Should you be dabbling in that type of magic? You've made 10 void matches!

name: Air Novice
description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with air.

name: Fire Novice
description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with fire.

name: Water Novice
description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with water.

name: Earth Novice
description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with earth.

name: Void Novice
description: Dark magic isn't for novices, so be careful!

name: Air Journeyman
description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of air.

name: Fire Journeyman
description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of fire.

name: Earth Journeyman
description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of earth.

name: Void Journeyman
description: Avoid the Void! You don't want to keep going down this path.

name: Air Master
description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of air.

name: Water Journeyman
description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of water.

name: Fire Master
description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of fire.

name: Earth Master
description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of earth.

name: Water Master
description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of water.

name: Void Master
description: You're now a master of the dark arts. Stupifexpelierminous!

name: Air Savant
description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Air.

name: Fire Savant
description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Fire.

name: Water Savant
description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Water.

name: Earth Savant
description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Earth.

name: Void Savant
description: Wow. You might have to uninstall before your darkness eats your computer.

name: Hegemon
description: You've just crossed beyond the Threshold of greatness by beating 20 levels!

name: Rune Master
description: So many runes, so little time. You've truly mastered the the manipulation of runes.

name: Rune Savant
description: You're such a savant that there are no more words to describe your awesomeness.

name: Fire Everything!
description: Explosions never felt this good.

name: Big Bada Boom
description: Your explosions are so big that they can probably be seen from space.

name: Easy Peasy
description: That wasn't so bad, was it? Good job defending the towers.

name: Middle Man
description: Excellent work defending the towers. Here's a lousy award for it.

name: Master of the Tower
description: We bow to you, the Master of the Tower.

name: The L Award
description: It's okay that you lost. It's not like the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

name: Frobs It All
description: This losing thing, it's getting to be a habit!

name: The Frobinator
description: If you can't say something nice, say nothing at all. (You lost again.)

name: QQ
description: How did you manage to lose to the Tutor? That's impossible!

name: The Mystical Ruler
description: Magic permeates the very fiber of your town.

name: The Republic
description: Power to the people! Well, at least they can vote on it.

name: The General
description: This is madness! No, this is ReignMaker!

name: Animal Planet
description: Peace and love to all who live in your town. Oh, and a few human sacrifices.

name: Apprentice Healer
description: You've healed your tower.

name: Journeyman Healer
description: Who knew towers needed so much healing?

name: Master Healer
description: If anyone needs a tower healed, they should come to you, the Master Healer.

name: Apprentice Blacksmith
description: Congratulations! You learned how to make something.

name: Journeyman Blacksmith
description: Congratulations! You learned to make a few things.

name: Expert Blacksmith
description: Wow, you sure do know how to make a lot of things!

name: Master Blacksmith
description: You are a master of metal, indeed. You know all the blacksmithing recipes.

name: Apprentice Builder
description: This is the house that you built.

name: Journeyman Builder
description: Things are starting to look nice around here.

name: Expert Builder
description: This is getting to be a rather splendid place.

name: Master Builder
description: Your city is looking mighty snazzy!

name: Tinker
description: You've definitely perked that smithy up.

name: Master Crafter
description: No finer place to craft has ever been built.

name: Dog Catcher
description: Discovered your first bestiary card. Gotta get them all!

name: Zookeeper
description: You're starting a rather nice collection there.

name: Monster Lover
description: Beasts! Gobbos! D'orcs! Oh my!

name: Gotta Catch Them All
description: I choose you and your little dog, too! You've collected 40 bestiary scrolls.

name: Ding!
description: You unlocked your first (and now your second) achievement.

name: Ding, Grats!
description: You've achieved 10 achievements. What an achievement!

name: Gifted
description: You've achieved 25 achievements. What an achievement!

name: Very Gifted
description: You've achieved 50 achievements. What an achievement!

name: Achiever
description: You've achieved 100 achievements. What an achievement!

name: Heals, Please!
description: You hired a healer from your people.

name: Healers, Healers Everywhere
description: You hired some healers to keep things healthy.

name: Heal Me, We Win!
description: Heals for everyone! You've hired a high priest.

name: Drood
description: Hired a druid from your citizens

name: Droods
description: Holy fluffy bunnies - you got yourself a lot of druids.

name: Many Droods
description: Back to nature! You hired an archdruid.

name: Stone Roller
description: You got yourself a stoner, man.

name: Rock and Hard Place
description: You hired a bunch of stoners, and the rocks rained down.

name: Hard Rock Hero
description: Whoaaaah. That's a heaaaavy rock.

name: Point and Click
description: You hired an archer.

name: Shoot 'Em Up
description: You hired some archers, and they're very into pin cushions.

name: Pew! Pew!
description: You hired not just any archer, but an elite archer!

name: Peek-a-boo
description: Hired a scout from your citizens.

name: Hide and Seek
description: Hired a bunch of scouts from your citizens and sent them to the battlefield.

name: Search and Destroy
description: Hired a lead scout from your citizens, and watch him scurry around the field.

name: Whole Lot of Nothing
description: Corrupted, schmorrupted. You'll break any runes you can find.

name: Ice Breaker
description: Nothing stays frozen around you, you ice breaker!

name: Thrifty
description: Save those triads for a rainy day. You'll need them.

name: Triad Pincher
description: A triad saved is a triad earned.

name: Miser
description: You need to go swim in your triads today.

name: Little Spender
description: You finally have some buying power. You've spent 5000 triads.

name: Middle Spender
description: Buy, baby, buy! You've spnt 50,000 triads.

name: Big Spenda'
description: It's only money, right? You've spent 100,000 triads.

name: Gold Digger
description: Digging up triads is your forte. You have collected 1000 triad runes on your board.

name: Team Medic
description: You don't need anyone else to heal you. You have used 1000 health runes.

name: Bombastic
description: Bombs are your specialty.

name: Mind Reader
description: Let's just take a peek at those thoughts.

name: Psion
description: You must be psychic!

name: Master Psion
description: Your citizens know you spy on them with care.

name: Apprentice Becomes the Master
description: You beat the Tutor in the tutorial. Congratulations!

name: What a Prick
description: You beat the Godgantupine. Congratulations!

name: Together at Last
description: You beat Thargorina. Congratulations!

name: Void the Defeat
description: You defeated the Obliterator, a servant of the Void. Congratulations!

name: Not in Kansas Anymore
description: You beat the Wizard whose face is strangely familiar. Congratulations!

name: Flung The Flinger
description: You beat the Elemental Lord, something the Alchemists claimed they did. Congratulations!

name: Got My Eye on You
description: You beat that rolling eyeball known as the Glaring Glancer. Congratulations!

name: Got Boned
description: You beat Bizarre Bones. Congratulations!

name: So. Many. Pokka.
description: You beat the Cubicle. Congratulations!

name: Unchained Melodrama
description: You beat the Obliterati. Congratulations!

name: Heal OP
description: You beat General Mabelrode and saved the world. Congratulations!

name: Turtoom Mastery
description: You did a good thing in destroying these poor, corrupted creatures.

name: Turtoom Boom Boom
description: We shall mourn these good turtooms.

name: D'orc Mastery
description: Good job in destroying the d'orcs!

name: Gobbo Mastery
description: The gobbo horde has been contained.

name: Strange Creatures Mastery
description: Strange creatures? Cute but no cigar!

name: Gargantupine Mastery
description: The gargantupine threat has been contained.

name: Void Mastery
description: Avoid the Void. That's definitely a new saying.

name: Dragonet Mastery
description: Excellent work in dispersing the crazed dragonets.

name: Romel Mastery
description: Horrid creatures! All romels need to be destroyed.

name: Evil Slemor Mastery
description: What kind of horrible beings would corrupt slemors?

name: Undead Mastery
description: Who doesn't like fighting the undead?

name: Glancer Mastery
description: Fighting eyeballs? At first you were the pupil, but now you are the master.

name: Gold That Glitters
description: Gold flags for every tower? Maybe YOU should be the king!
